MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA9 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Wood Street, Holly Bank Grove and surrounding streets. It was be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.00PM to complete repairs to a fault on our underground cable network. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of faulty equipment and the weather conditions on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.42PM on 26th January 2021.
